results.idea: BATSH short-volume share cross-sectional zscore
results.description: Uses BATSH short volume share (short_vol / total_vol) as cross-section mean-reversion signal. Applied SUGGESTION1 by combining two datafields (svol and totalvolume). SUGGESTION2 not applied (no vector fields in these data). SUGGESTION3 not applied because both fields have coverage = 1.0. SUGGESTION4 applied: selected BATSH totalvolume (userCount=69, alphaCount=102) to favor well-used fields. Confidence set to 0.65 based on economic rationale (shorting pressure -> reversal) and data robustness.

results.idea: BATSH short-volume momentum (5d returns)
results.description: Momentum in short-volume share: recent increase in short-share may predict continued outperformance of shorts. SUGGESTION1 used two fields (svol, totalvolume). SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed (coverage=1.0). SUGGESTION4 used high user/alpha fields. Confidence 0.55 (short-volume momentum weaker than reversal).

results.idea: BATSH short-size buyer/seller imbalance (s_data1 - m_data1)
results.description: Measure imbalance between sell-side and market-side aggregated sizes to detect unexpected shorting pressure. SUGGESTION1 used two sumsize fields (sumsize_s_data1 and sumsize_m_data1). SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not applied (coverage ~1.0). SUGGESTION4 considered field popularity where available. Confidence 0.6 (structural pressure signal).

results.idea: BATSH short-size spike detection (ts_arg_max)
results.description: Detect intraday/overnight spikes in short-side sumsize: instruments with current max short-size in window are flagged. SUGGESTION1 used sumsize only (single datafield) because that captures spike directly. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 chose sumsize_s_data1 with good coverage/userCount. Confidence 0.5 (spikes can be noisy).

results.idea: BATSH short-share relative volatility (5d std of short share)
results.description: Instruments with rising short-share volatility may revert or exhibit regime change. SUGGESTION1 used two fields (svol & totalvolume) to compute share. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used high-alphaCount fields. Confidence 0.52 (volatility signals modest).

results.idea: BATSH short concentration (short sumsize growth vs 21d mean)
results.description: Compare short-side sumsize to its 21-day mean to find unusual concentration. SUGGESTION1 used sumsize_s_data1 alone (single-field signal is strongest). SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 chosen field has high coverage. Confidence 0.6 (concentration often predictive).

results.idea: BYXX short-volume share mean-reversion
results.description: Same ratio idea applied to BYXX market center: short_vol / total_vol cross-sectional zscore for mean-reversion. SUGGESTION1 used two fields (byxxshvol_svol, byxxshvol_totalvolume). SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not required (coverage=1.0). SUGGESTION4 used BYXX totalvolume (userCount high). Confidence 0.63 (similar to BATSH but adjusted for BYXX liquidity).

results.idea: BYXX short-volume sudden jump (ts_delta 1d)
results.description: Flag instruments with large 1-day increase in short-volume share. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 chose widely used fields. Confidence 0.58 (short-term jumps informative).

results.idea: BYXX sumsize momentum (5d ts_returns on sumsize_s_data1)
results.description: Short-side sumsize momentum: persistent increase suggests sustained short pressure. SUGGESTION1 uses single field (sumsize_s_data1) for clarity. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed (coverage=1.0). SUGGESTION4 used popular sumsize fields. Confidence 0.5 (momentum mixed).

results.idea: BYXX short share zscore of 21d deviation
results.description: Cross-sectional rank of (short-share - 21d mean) standardized. SUGGESTION1 combined two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 selected fields with good alphaCount. Confidence 0.61 (medium confidence).

results.idea: EDGASH short-volume concentration (vec-like avg proxy)
results.description: Proxy for intraday concentration by averaging two short-volume measures (svol & marketcenter total) — used add/ divide to combine fields because no true vector fields. SUGGESTION1 used two datafields. SUGGESTION2 not applied (no vector fields). SUGGESTION3 not needed (coverage=1.0). SUGGESTION4 chosen edgashvol_totalvolume (userCount decent). Confidence 0.54 (proxy weaker than true vector).

results.idea: EDGASH short-size imbalance momentum (s_data2 - m_data2, ts_returns)
results.description: Momentum of imbalance between short-side and market-side sumsize using data2 fields. SUGGESTION1 used two sumsize fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not necessary. SUGGESTION4 chosen fields with acceptable userCount. Confidence 0.5 (moderate).

results.idea: EDGX short-volume share long-term reversion (60d)
results.description: Cross-sectional signal: short_share - 60d mean, scaled. SUGGESTION1 used two fields (edgxshvol_svol & total). SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not applied (coverage=1.0). SUGGESTION4 used edgxshvol_totalvolume (userCount=45, alphaCount=91) for robustness. Confidence 0.66 (long-term mean reversion stronger).

results.idea: EDGX short-size divergence (s_data1 / m_data1)
results.description: Ratio of short-side sumsize to market-side sumsize to identify disproportionate short activity. SUGGESTION1 used two fields (s_data1, m_data1). SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed (coverage high). SUGGESTION4 used widely available fields. Confidence 0.59 (ratio often meaningful).

results.idea: BATSH short-share extreme quantile
results.description: Flag instruments in the top quantile of short-share using cross-sectional quantile (gaussian). SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used totalvolume field with high alphaCount. Confidence 0.62 (extremes predictive).

results.idea: BYXX short-size zscore (winsorized)
results.description: Winsorize then zscore the short-side sumsize to control outliers. SUGGESTION1 used one field (sumsize_s_data1). SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 selected commonly used field. Confidence 0.57 (winsorizing stabilizes).

results.idea: EDGASH short-volatility breakout (ts_arg_min of 10d share)
results.description: Identify instruments where today is local minimum short-share (potential reversal upward). SUGGESTION1 used two fields for share. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used robust totalvolume field. Confidence 0.48 (minima less reliable).

results.idea: EDGX short-size short-term IR (ts_ir on sumsize)
results.description: Compute information ratio of short-size over last 21 days to find consistent shorting pressure. SUGGESTION1 used single field. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not applied. SUGGESTION4 used field with good historical usage. Confidence 0.64 (consistent pressure strong).

results.idea: BATSH short-share rapid mean-reversion (hump)
results.description: Use hump to reduce turnover and capture short-share mean-reversion of the ratio signal. SUGGESTION1 combined two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used high alphaCount field. Confidence 0.6 (hump improves tradeability).

results.idea: BATSH short-size relative rank (ts_rank 10d)
results.description: Rank each instrument by its 10-day short-side sumsize position; high rank -> high short pressure. SUGGESTION1 used one sumsize field. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used popular sumsize field. Confidence 0.53 (ranking simple and interpretable).

results.idea: BYXX short-share spike then fade (ts_max_diff)
results.description: Use ts_max_diff on short-share to capture large deviations from recent max (potential fade). SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 chosen robust fields. Confidence 0.56 (spike-fade patterns observed).

results.idea: BYXX short concentration normalized (scale within cross-section)
results.description: Cross-sectional normalized short sumsize to control for extremes. SUGGESTION1 used single field. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used byxxsh_sumsize_s_data1 with good usage. Confidence 0.51 (normalization reduces cross-sectional bias).

results.idea: EDGASH short-share abrupt change (days_from_last_change)
results.description: Days since last change in short-side sumsize: long static periods then change can be informative. SUGGESTION1 used one field. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used sumsize_s_data1. Confidence 0.45 (signal niche and lower confidence).

results.idea: EDGX short-share combined zscore (mean of two zscores)
results.description: Average cross-sectional zscores of short-share computed with data1 and data2 to reduce idiosyncratic noise. SUGGESTION1 used two fields (svol/total for both). SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used fields with strong user/alpha counts. Confidence 0.68 (combination stabilizes signal).

results.idea: BATSH short-size mean minus peer mean (cross-sectional normalize)
results.description: Subtract cross-sectional mean from instrument short-size to get relative signal. SUGGESTION1 used single field. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used high-coverage field. Confidence 0.6 (relative positioning valuable).

results.idea: BYXX short-share 3d zscore momentum
results.description: 3-day ts_zscore of short-share captures short bursts; SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used reliable fields. Confidence 0.55 (short bursts moderately predictive).

results.idea: EDGASH short-side relative kurtosis
results.description: High kurtosis in short-side sumsize indicates fat tails; used ts_kurtosis on sumsize_s_data1. SUGGESTION1 single field. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used field with decent userCount. Confidence 0.47 (higher-order moments noisy).

results.idea: EDGX short-share rolling covariance with volume
results.description: Covariance between short-side volume and total volume to identify when shorts dominate trading. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used widely measured fields. Confidence 0.58 (covariance informative).

results.idea: BATSH short-size pairwise divergence (data1 vs data2)
results.description: Compare data1 and data2 short-size measures to detect data-stream discrepancies (possible irregular activity). SUGGESTION1 used two datafields (sumsize_s_data1 vs sumsize_s_data2). SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used both fields with good coverage. Confidence 0.5 (discrepancies can be noisy).

results.idea: BYXX short-volume rolling product (ts_product)
results.description: Product of short-volume share over d days to capture persistent pressure (low values if intermittent). SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used fields with strong alpha usage. Confidence 0.49 (product sensitive to zeros).

results.idea: EDGASH short-share deviation scaled (ts_scale)
results.description: Scale short-share deviations to 0-1 over lookback to control for instrument-specific ranges. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used reliable totalvolume. Confidence 0.54 (scaling reduces distortions).

results.idea: EDGX short-size last non-equal value change (last_diff_value)
results.description: Use last_diff_value to find previous distinct short-size value (helps detect regime flips). SUGGESTION1 used one field. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not necessary. SUGGESTION4 used common field. Confidence 0.46 (specialized).

results.idea: BATSH short-share cross-sectional tail clipping
results.description: Tail-clip extreme short-share values then rank for robustness. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 picked widely used fields. Confidence 0.6 (robust to outliers).

results.idea: BYXX short-size days since change weighted
results.description: Combine days_from_last_change with current short-share to prefer recent changes with large magnitude. SUGGESTION1 used two fields but implemented via multiply to keep operators <=7. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used common fields. Confidence 0.52 (heuristic).

results.idea: EDGASH short-share 10d rank then quantile
results.description: Compute ts_rank over 10 days then map to quantile to normalize across instruments. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used high-coverage fields. Confidence 0.57 (rank->quantile stabilizes).

results.idea: EDGX short-size normalized decay (ts_decay_linear)
results.description: Apply linear decay on short-share to emphasize recent changes. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used edgxshvol fields with strong alphaCount. Confidence 0.6 (decay improves recency).

results.idea: BATSH sumsize short-term over long-term (5d/60d)
results.description: Ratio of 5d mean to 60d mean of short-side sumsize to detect acceleration. SUGGESTION1 used single field. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used high-coverage sumsize. Confidence 0.62 (acceleration informative).

results.idea: BYXX short-share momentum-adjusted zscore
results.description: Combine ts_returns(5d) and current zscore to amplify consistent moves: multiply two signals. SUGGESTION1 used two fields (svol & totalvolume) for share. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used robust fields. Confidence 0.59 (combination improves SNR).

results.idea: EDGASH short-share low-turnover filter
results.description: Trade only when totalvolume above median byxx threshold to avoid illiquid signals: used if_else with simple condition using totalvolume and median proxy via ts_mean. SUGGESTION1 used totalvolume only. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used totalvolume high userCount. Confidence 0.5 (practical guard).

results.idea: EDGX short-size pair-signal smoothing (ts_zscore + hump)
results.description: Apply ts_zscore on short-size then hump to reduce churning of signals. SUGGESTION1 used single field. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not necessary. SUGGESTION4 used edgxsh_sumsize_s_data1. Confidence 0.61 (smoothing helpful).

results.idea: BATSH short-share cross-sectional winsorized quantile
results.description: Winsorize short-share then compute quantile to produce robust cross-section signal. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used high alphaCount totalvolume. Confidence 0.63 (robust extreme ranking).

results.idea: BYXX short-size ts_arg_max combined with returns
results.description: Flag assets that hit 10d max short-size and show negative 3d returns (momentum + max). SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used well-covered fields. Confidence 0.56 (compound filter improves precision).

results.idea: EDGASH short-share zscore of m_data2 vs s_data2
results.description: Compare market-side vs short-side data2 to detect divergence: zscore(m_data2 - s_data2). SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 coverage OK. SUGGESTION4 chosen based on userCount. Confidence 0.54 (divergence signal plausible).

results.idea: EDGX short-share recent max-min gap (vec_range proxy)
results.description: Proxy for intraday range by subtracting ts_min from ts_max over 10d using ts_av_diff components (no vector available). SUGGESTION1 used single sumsize field. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used common field. Confidence 0.48 (approximate range).

results.idea: BATSH short-volume persistence score (ts_count_nans-aware)
results.description: Count days with valid short-volume in lookback (higher persistence implies consistent trading). SUGGESTION1 used single field. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used high-coverage svol. Confidence 0.5 (persistence informative for liquidity).

results.idea: BYXX short-share mean reversion with winsorize
results.description: Compute short_share minus 10d mean then winsorize result to remove outliers, then cross-section zscore. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used robust fields. Confidence 0.6 (cleaned reversion signal).

results.idea: EDGASH short-size cross-field consensus (avg of two sumsize zscores)
results.description: Average zscores of sumsize data1 and data2 to improve robustness. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used widely available sumsize fields. Confidence 0.66 (consensus reduces noise).

results.idea: EDGX short-share rapid IR drop (ts_ir delta)
results.description: Detect decreases in ts_ir over 5d for sumsize indicating weakening persistent short pressure. SUGGESTION1 used single field. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not required. SUGGESTION4 used edgxsh_sumsize fields. Confidence 0.53 (secondary signal).

results.idea: BATSH short-share scaled by liquidity (divide by totalvolume zscore)
results.description: Scale short-share by cross-sectional zscore of totalvolume to emphasize liquid signals. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used totalvolume high userCount. Confidence 0.6 (liquidity scaling reduces noise).

results.idea: BYXX short-volume fade after arg_max (mean reversion)
results.description: If short-size hits local max, expect subsequent fade; implement as negative ts_arg_max signal multiplied by short_share. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used robust fields. Confidence 0.55 (fade often observed).

results.idea: EDGASH short-share low past variance (contrarian)
results.description: Favor instruments with low short-share variance (ts_std_dev low) assuming informed shorting leads to concentrated moves elsewhere. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 chosen stable fields. Confidence 0.49 (theory more speculative).

results.idea: EDGX short-share scaled IR (ts_ir normalized)
results.description: Normalize ts_ir by its ts_std_dev to find unusually consistent shorting. SUGGESTION1 used single field. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used edgxsh_sumsize_s_data1. Confidence 0.6 (consistency useful).

results.idea: BATSH short-volume 2-field disagreement filter
results.description: Compute difference between two short-volume measures (data1 vs data2) and zscore to detect anomalies. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 selected fields with acceptable usage. Confidence 0.52 (disagreement often signals noise or error).

results.idea: BYXX short-size cumulative sum (ts_sum 5d)
results.description: Cumulative short-size over 5 days to capture sustained activity. SUGGESTION1 used single field. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used high-coverage field. Confidence 0.53 (persistent activity signal).

results.idea: EDGASH short-share cross-sectional zscore after backfill (kth_element)
results.description: Use kth_element to backfill occasional missing sumsize values (k=1) then cross-sectional zscore. SUGGESTION1 used single field. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not strictly required given coverage but included for robustness. SUGGESTION4 used field with near-full coverage. Confidence 0.55 (minor robustness improvement).

results.idea: EDGX short-share volatility-adjusted mean reversion
results.description: Divide short-share deviation from mean by its ts_std_dev to get Sharpe-like reversion signal. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used fields with strong alpha counts. Confidence 0.65 (volatility-adjusted signals robust).

results.idea: BATSH short-size local reversal (ts_arg_min & subsequent returns)
results.description: If today is local min and short-share rises next day historically, use arg_min as entry. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used robust fields. Confidence 0.5 (requires execution testing).

results.idea: BYXX short-share leading indicator (ts_regression beta vs totalvolume)
results.description: Use ts_regression to get beta of short-volume vs total volume and favor high beta instruments (shorts move with volume). SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used fields with good history. Confidence 0.58 (beta informative).

results.idea: EDGASH short-share scaled by group proxy (normalize by ts_mean)
results.description: Normalize short-share by its 30d mean to detect deviations; used ts_mean as proxy for group behavior. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 selected widely used fields. Confidence 0.6 (simple and effective).

results.idea: EDGX short-size 2-stage filter (quantile then zscore)
results.description: Select top quantile then apply zscore to rank within that quantile for sizing. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used high alphaCount fields. Confidence 0.64 (filter->rank is robust).

results.idea: BATSH short-size mean reversion with winsorized ratio
results.description: Compute winsorized short-share ratio then mean-revert via subtracting ts_mean. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used fields with strong userCount. Confidence 0.61 (winsorize+reversion stabilizes).

results.idea: BYXX short-size fast/slow crossover (ts_mean 5d vs 21d)
results.description: Signal when 5d mean of short-size crosses above/below 21d mean. SUGGESTION1 used two fields for share. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 chosen common fields. Confidence 0.6 (crossover classic).

results.idea: EDGASH short-volume share decile bucketing
results.description: Bucket short-share into deciles using bucket(rank(x), range) to create discrete group exposures. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used stable fields. Confidence 0.52 (categorical exposures usable).

results.idea: EDGX short-size local IR extremum (ts_arg_max on ts_ir)
results.description: Find instruments where ts_ir reached local maximum (consistent shorting) using nested ts_arg_max. SUGGESTION1 used single field. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used edgxsh_sumsize_s_data1. Confidence 0.58 (consistency signal).

results.idea: BATSH short-share cross-sectional rank product with liquidity
results.description: Multiply cross-sectional rank of short-share with rank of totalvolume to favor liquid highly-shorted names. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used high userCount fields. Confidence 0.62 (liquid+shorted is tradable).

results.idea: BYXX sumsize normalized by 21d stddev
results.description: Divide current short-sumsize by its 21d std to find unusual activity scaled by volatility. SUGGESTION1 used single field. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not necessary. SUGGESTION4 used popular sumsize. Confidence 0.6 (volatility scaling useful).

results.idea: EDGASH short-share fade after large ts_delta
results.description: If 1d ts_delta of short-share is large positive, short it to capture fade; use threshold via greater and if_else. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used robust fields. Confidence 0.56 (thresholding reduces noise).

results.idea: EDGX short-size cross-field corroboration (both data1 & data2 > threshold)
results.description: Require both sumsize data1 and data2 to be high (and) to reduce false signals. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 selected both data versions. Confidence 0.63 (corroboration improves precision).

results.idea: BATSH short-share zscore smoothed (ts_zscore then ts_mean)
results.description: Compute ts_zscore over 5d then smooth by 3d mean to reduce noise. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used highly used totalvolume. Confidence 0.62 (smoothing adds stability).

results.idea: BYXX short-size ddetection using ts_max_diff on sumsize
results.description: ts_max_diff on sumsize to find sharp declines from recent highs (potential buying opportunities). SUGGESTION1 used single field. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 chosen field with good alphaCount. Confidence 0.54 (directional).

results.idea: EDGASH short-share zscore of short/market sumsize ratio
results.description: Compute zscore of (short_sumsize / market_sumsize) to find disproportionate shorts controlling for market side. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used fields with high coverage. Confidence 0.6 (ratio normalizes across activity).

results.idea: EDGX short-share recent reversal score (reverse ts_returns)
results.description: Reverse short-side 3d returns to capture mean-reversion: negative recent short accumulation suggests short-covering. SUGGESTION1 used single field. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used edgxshvol fields. Confidence 0.55 (reversal modest).

results.idea: BATSH short-size persistent spike filter (ts_count_nans + ts_sum)
results.description: Combines count of valid days and 5d sumsize to ensure persistence. SUGGESTION1 used single field. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used batssh_sumsize fields. Confidence 0.51 (pragmatic filter).

results.idea: BYXX short-share outlier detection (pasteurize then zscore)
results.description: Use pasteurize to remove inf/out-of-universe then zscore short-share ratio. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used well-used fields. Confidence 0.6 (outlier handling helpful).

results.idea: EDGASH short-size short/long asymmetry (signed_power)
results.description: Emphasize large positive deviations via signed_power on short-share deviation. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used established fields. Confidence 0.53 (nonlinear emphasis may help).

results.idea: EDGX short-share scaled quantile (uniform driver)
results.description: Compute quantile with uniform driver to get relative percentile without gaussian assumption. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used edgxshvol_totalvolume. Confidence 0.61 (alternative mapping sometimes better).

results.idea: BATSH short-size momentum plus volatility screener
results.description: Combine ts_returns(5d) and inverse ts_std_dev(5d) to favor momentum with low recent volatility. SUGGESTION1 used two fields to form ratio. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used reliable fields. Confidence 0.57 (composite filter).

results.idea: BYXX short-size extreme-day filter (ts_arg_max & winsorize)
results.description: Select days that are 10d arg_max then winsorize the short-share to reduce extreme sizing. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used fields with good alphaCount. Confidence 0.54 (protects against lethargic extremes).

results.idea: EDGASH short-size discounted by market-side activity
results.description: Divide short-side sumsize by market-side totalvolume to control for general market activity. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used common metrics. Confidence 0.59 (normalization helpful).

results.idea: EDGX short-size cross-check data2 momentum
results.description: Use data2 sumsize momentum to validate data1 signals (consensus). SUGGESTION1 used two fields (data1 and data2). SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used both data versions having decent userCounts. Confidence 0.65 (consensus across data versions strong).

results.idea: BATSH short-share simple threshold contrarian
results.description: If short-share exceeds fixed threshold (e.g., 0.2), take contrarian position (reverse). SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used robust fields. Confidence 0.5 (requires calibration per market).

results.idea: BYXX short-size composite zscore (sumsize + share)
results.description: Average zscores of sumsize and share to capture both absolute and relative short pressure. SUGGESTION1 used two fields (sumsize and share uses svol+totalvolume). SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used popular fields. Confidence 0.66 (composite improves robustness).

results.idea: EDGASH short-share overnight gap proxy (ts_delta 1d on sumsize)
results.description: Use 1d ts_delta on sumsize to proxy overnight or sudden activity. SUGGESTION1 used single field. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used fields with good usage. Confidence 0.52 (proxy noisy but informative).

results.idea: EDGX short-share scaled by recent max (divide by ts_max)
results.description: Normalize current short-share by its recent max to detect proximity to extremes. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used widely available fields. Confidence 0.6 (relative-to-max helps sizing).

results.idea: BATSH short-share low volatility contrarian
results.description: Favor instruments with low short-share volatility but high short-share level: divide zscore of level by ts_std_dev. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not necessary. SUGGESTION4 used robust fields. Confidence 0.58 (persistent yet stable pressure meaningful).

results.idea: BYXX short-size zscore seasonality check (ts_arg_max seasonally)
results.description: Use ts_arg_max over 252 days to detect seasonal peaks in shorting. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not necessary. SUGGESTION4 selected fields with long history. Confidence 0.47 (seasonality requires long-term data).

results.idea: EDGASH short-size mean reversion with winsorize & scale
results.description: Winsorize deviation from mean then ts_scale to map to 0-1 for portfolio sizing. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 chosen stable fields. Confidence 0.62 (normalized signals tradeable).

results.idea: EDGX short-share consensus momentum (both volumes rapid increase)
results.description: Require both svol and sumsize to show positive 3d returns for stronger signal. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 chosen fields with high alphaCount. Confidence 0.67 (multi-indicator consensus strong).

results.idea: BATSH short-share downside protection (trade_when low volume)
results.description: Only trade when totalvolume exceeds its 21d median (proxy via ts_mean) to reduce drawdown from illiquid names. SUGGESTION1 used totalvolume single field. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used highly used totalvolume. Confidence 0.54 (risk control measure).

results.idea: BYXX short-size two-window zscore difference
results.description: Difference between short-share zscore at 5d and 21d to detect acceleration. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used robust fields. Confidence 0.6 (acceleration detection valuable).

results.idea: EDGASH short-side immediate spike zscore (1d ts_zscore)
results.description: 1-day ts_zscore to capture abnormal jump relative to recent history. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used common fields. Confidence 0.55 (short-term zscore useful).

results.idea: EDGX short-share smoothed quantile (ts_mean of quantile)
results.description: Compute quantile then smooth by ts_mean to reduce noise. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used high-quality fields. Confidence 0.62 (smoothing effective).

results.idea: BATSH short-size ratio of sumsize data1/data2 (data-version divergence)
results.description: Divide sumsize data1 by data2 to detect reporting or behavioral differences across feeds. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 coverage OK. SUGGESTION4 chosen widely available fields. Confidence 0.5 (data-version anomalies sometimes spurious).

results.idea: BYXX short-share momentum after low volatility
results.description: Long short-share momentum only if recent ts_std_dev below threshold to avoid whipsaws. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used robust fields. Confidence 0.56 (volatility filter reduces false positives).

results.idea: EDGASH short-share cross-sectional shrinkage (winsorize+zscore)
results.description: Winsorize short-share then zscore to get stable cross-sectional weights. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used high-usage fields. Confidence 0.61 (standard practice).

results.idea: EDGX short-size minimum support filter (group_count proxy)
results.description: Use group_count analog by requiring ts_count_nans low in lookback to ensure many valid observations (liquidity/persistence). SUGGESTION1 used single field. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used sumsize field. Confidence 0.5 (practical data-quality filter).

results.idea: BATSH short-share contrarian after consistent rises (ts_product + reverse)
results.description: If product of short-share over 5 days is high (persistent accumulation), take contrarian (reverse) position. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used widely measured fields. Confidence 0.58 (persistence often mean-reverts).

results.idea: BYXX short-size conditional trade_when by liquidity
results.description: Trade only when totalvolume above 21d mean to ensure tradability; SUGGESTION1 used totalvolume. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used totalvolume high userCount. Confidence 0.53 (practical constraint).

results.idea: EDGASH short-size multi-horizon zscore average
results.description: Average zscores across 3, 7, 21 day ts_zscores to capture consistent signals across horizons. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used stable fields. Confidence 0.67 (multi-horizon consensus strong).
results.implementation: divide(add(ts_zscore(divide(shrt43_edgashvol_svol, shrt43_edgashvol_totalvolume), 3), ts_zscore(divide(shrt43_edgashvol_svol, shrt43_edgashvol_totalvolume), 7), ts_zscore(divide(shrt43_edgashvol_svol, shrt43_edgashvol_totalvolume), 21), filter=true), 3)

results.idea: EDGX short-share extreme-day mean reversion (if_else arg_max)
results.description: If today is 5d arg_max short-share, take contrarian position via reverse; SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not necessary. SUGGESTION4 used popular fields. Confidence 0.56 (targeted mean-reversion).

results.idea: BATSH short-size zscore scaled by inverse market cap proxy (use totalvolume rank)
results.description: Emphasize smaller-capish names by dividing short-share zscore by totalvolume zscore (smaller totalvolume -> larger signal). SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used robust fields. Confidence 0.59 (size tilt can enhance returns).

results.idea: BYXX short-size consistent increase IR filter
results.description: Select instruments with positive ts_ir over 21d and rising ts_ir (ts_delta positive) as strong persistent shorting indicators. SUGGESTION1 used single field. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used established fields. Confidence 0.63 (persistent IR is strong).

results.idea: EDGASH short-share median-filtered zscore
results.description: Use ts_quantile (gaussian) then center by subtracting median to get robust anomaly score. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used widely available fields. Confidence 0.6 (robust centralization).

results.idea: EDGX short-share multi-feed confirmation (svol & sumsize both elevated)
results.description: Require both short-volume share and short-sumsize to be above their 10d means to confirm elevated short interest. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used both feeds with high alphaCount. Confidence 0.68 (multi-feed confirmation robust).
results.implementation: and(greater(divide(shrt43_edgxshvol_svol, shrt43_edgxshvol_totalvolume), ts_mean(divide(shrt43_edgxshvol_svol, shrt43_edgxshvol_totalvolume), 10)), greater(shrt43_edgxsh_sumsize_s_data1, ts_mean(shrt43_edgxsh_sumsize_s_data1, 10)))

results.idea: BATSH short-size zscore trimmed and scaled
results.description: Trim extremes via tail, then scale by ts_scale to 0-1 for position sizing. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used commonly traded fields. Confidence 0.6 (practical sizing approach).

results.idea: BYXX short-share adaptive threshold (ts_scale then if_else)
results.description: Compute ts_scale to get instrument-specific 0-1 measure, then trade when above 0.9. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used robust fields. Confidence 0.62 (adaptive thresholding effective).

results.idea: EDGASH short-share short-term reversal via ts_rank
results.description: Use ts_rank over 3d of short-share and reverse sign (contrarian on recent leaders). SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used stable fields. Confidence 0.55 (short-term reversal plausible).

results.idea: EDGX short-size dynamic shrinkage (winsorize + ts_mean)
results.description: Winsorize deviation from 21d mean then take ts_mean across 3 days for smoother signal. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used well-used fields. Confidence 0.63 (practical smoothed signal).

results.idea: BATSH short-share mean reversion conditional on sustained volume
results.description: Mean-revert only when totalvolume over 5d exceeds 21d mean to ensure activity is sustained. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used high-coverage totalvolume. Confidence 0.58 (combines reversion with liquidity filter).
results.implementation: if_else(greater(ts_mean(shrt43_batsshvol_totalvolume, 5), ts_mean(shrt43_batsshvol_totalvolume, 21)), subtract(divide(shrt43_batsshvol_svol, shrt43_batsshvol_totalvolume), ts_mean(divide(shrt43_batsshvol_svol, shrt43_batsshvol_totalvolume), 10)), NaN)

results.idea: BYXX short-size negative-feedback filter (reverse after sustained rise)
results.description: If 5d mean > 21d mean, take reverse position expecting mean-reversion. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used robust fields. Confidence 0.6 (classic strategy).
results.implementation: if_else(greater(ts_mean(divide(shrt43_byxxshvol_svol, shrt43_byxxshvol_totalvolume), 5), ts_mean(divide(shrt43_byxxshvol_svol, shrt43_byxxshvol_totalvolume), 21)), reverse(divide(shrt43_byxxshvol_svol, shrt43_byxxshvol_totalvolume)), NaN)

results.idea: EDGASH short-size cross-feed ratio stability test
results.description: Compute ratio of data1/data2 sumsize and zscore to detect persistent differences across feeds indicating structural imbalances. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used fields with acceptable userCount. Confidence 0.52 (diagnostic signal).

results.idea: EDGX short-share volatility breakout (ts_std_dev increases)
results.description: Flag instruments where ts_std_dev of short-share increased versus its 21d mean (breakout). SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used popular fields. Confidence 0.55 (breakouts can signal upcoming moves).

results.idea: BATSH sumsize divergence detection (m_data2 vs s_data2)
results.description: Detect when market-side and short-side data2 diverge substantially using subtract + zscore. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not required. SUGGESTION4 used fields with good coverage. Confidence 0.51 (diagnostic).

results.idea: BYXX short-share smoothed IR ranking
results.description: Rank instruments by ts_ir over 21d and smooth ranks via ts_mean to focus on persistent signal. SUGGESTION1 used single field. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used widely used sumsize. Confidence 0.62 (IR ranking robust).

results.idea: EDGASH short-share two-stage winsorized ratio
results.description: Winsorize both numerator and denominator separately then compute ratio to reduce distortions. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not necessary. SUGGESTION4 chosen robust fields. Confidence 0.6 (double winsorize stable).

results.idea: EDGX short-share short-term mean reversion with tail clipping
results.description: Compute deviation from 5d mean, tail-clip extreme values, cross-sectional zscore. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 used edgxshvol fields. Confidence 0.61 (robust reversion).
results.implementation: zscore(tail(subtract(divide(shrt43_edgxshvol_svol, shrt43_edgxshvol_totalvolume), ts_mean(divide(shrt43_edgxshvol_svol, shrt43_edgxshvol_totalvolume), 5)), lower=-1, upper=1, newval=0))
